file_content.text: Thank you for shooting those assassins, but we have no further business.
Those men were coming to kill me. You arrived just in time.
Risha says you can sneak me inside House Thul's spaceport.
Let's get to business.
What's wrong, you're too good to speak Basic?
You're speaking Huttese.
This planet is full of eavesdroppers--but few who comprehend this language. Our business will remain a secret.
What did you do to bring down that much heat?
Who were those assassins?
I insulted someone lacking a sense of humor. But that's not why you're here.
I possess an Imperial transmitter that will send an "all-access" signal to the Thul spaceport security doors. You'll have full clearance to enter.
Once inside, I recommend committing your crimes discreetly and getting out before anyone notices.
This is about justice, not crime.
I'm no criminal.
Oh, I'm sure.
I expect Risha to turn over every recording of my vacation to Nar Shaddaa. I'm sick of her blackmailing me.
What kind of galaxy is it when a man can't enjoy himself on holiday?
I have no business with you. Respect my privacy.
Will your gizmo disguise two people?
Will my partner be safe, too?
No, but you'll be marked as an Imperial. The guards will assume your young accomplice is a prisoner.
No, but you'll be marked as an Imperial. The guards will assume your hairy accomplice is a prisoner.
I move fast when it counts. Just give me your key so I can get going.
I always do.
If your gadget fizzles out early, I'll be back for your head.
This better work.
You'll find the holo-disguise unit at my spring retreat. Good luck removing the thugs who have invaded my home.
Unfortunately, I was forced to abandon the device when the men you fought attacked my spring retreat. I'm sure they left forces occupying it.
Let me guess... I need to blast into your home and steal this thing?
I see where this is going.
You catch on quickly.
You seem like a rich man. Buy a new holo-disguise unit.
Get me another disguise.
They don't sell things like that on Alderaan. Besides, I'm told time is an issue here.
Seems like the only thing you can provide me is target practice.
Then you're no good to me.
Wait--you haven't let me finish!
I'll give you a key to access the holo-disguise unit. All you have to do is remove the men occupying my spring retreat.
Hey, I'm a professional.
Don't tell me what to do.
Reinforcements are coming! Don't let them kill me!
